General.Name: Zhejiang Garden Bio-chemical High-tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Garden Biopharmaceutical Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and supplies vitamin D3, cholesterol, and calcifediol in China. Its products have applications in food additives, nutrition and health products, and medicine. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Garden Bio-chemical High-tech Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Dongyang, China.

2.Name: Mr. Quanheng  Yu
2.Title: VP, Sec. to the Board & Director
